original_title: Katie Melua at the Rivoli Ballroom
overview: In this unique event, audiences around the world will have the chance to enjoy Katie Melua and her band perform the entirety of Album No 8, as well as classics from her extensive catalogue, from one of Londonâ€™s most iconic venues.  Joining Katie on stage will be Tim Harries on bass, Mark Edwards on keys, Zurab Melua on guitars, Joe Yoshida on drums and Nina Harries on double bass and backing vocals.
title: Katie Melua at the Rivoli Ballroom
